248302.content:
@"Skvizy"#p248055 

```
WITH RECURSIVE filmovi(genreid, genrename, trackId, supgenreID) AS
	(
		SELECT genreID, genreName, trackID, supgenreid
		FROM movie NATURAL JOIN trackgenre NATURAL JOIN genre 
		GROUP BY trackgenre.genreID, genreName, trackID, supgenreid
		UNION
		SELECT genre.genreID, genre.genreName, filmovi.trackID, genre.supgenreid
		FROM filmovi, genre 
		WHERE genre.genreID = filmovi.supgenreId
		GROUP BY genre.genreID, genre.genreName, filmovi.trackID, genre.supgenreid
	)
SELECT filmovi.genreID, filmovi.genreName, COUNT(filmovi.trackID) AS numofmovies FROM filmovi 
GROUP BY filmovi.genreID, filmovi.genreName
ORDER BY genreID
```

248692.content:
@"MsBrightside"#p248653 

Kakav ti je poƒçetni select? Ja dobijem za Action i Drama jedan film vi≈°e u 2020. koji bi trebao biti u 2021. i onda mi tako i na kraju ostane.

Ovo mi je select prije rekurzije 
```
SELECT genreID, genreName, supgenreid, EXTRACT(year FROM viewenddatetime) as godina, COUNT(viewenddatetime)
		FROM movie NATURAL JOIN trackgenre NATURAL JOIN genre NATURAL JOIN trackview
		GROUP BY genreID, genreName, supgenreid, godina
```
I na slici je jedn od 2 ≈æanra koji ima krive podatke za 20. i 21. ![](assets/2021-11-01/00025.png)

248696.content: @"mgd"#p248665 jel bi mogla molim te zalijepiti tablicu rezultata?

248703.content:
@"Exelero"#p248692 

```sql
select
gname, cast(extract(year from viewstartdatetime) as int) as year, count(viewstartdatetime) as br
from genres, trackgenre, trackview, movie
where genre1 = trackgenre.genreid
and trackview.trackid = trackgenre.trackid
and trackview.trackid = movie.trackid
and extract(year from viewstartdatetime) in (2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021)
group by genres.genreid, gname, extract(year from viewstartdatetime)
order by genres.genreid'
```

248762.content:
@"reygrep"#p248758 Okej, ovo vrati dobro, ali mi nije jasno zasto. 

`select to_tsquery('ugli | worthi | famili');` mi vraca **'ug' | 'worthi' | 'famili'** tj. dodatno normalizira ugli na ug, a ugli bi vec trebao biti normaliziran.

Dok mi `select to_tsquery('ugly | worthy | family');` vraca **'ugli' | 'worthi' | 'famili'** sto bih rekao da odgovara uvjetu napisanog zadatka.

Kad ides normalizirat Ugly (`select to_tsvector('Ugly');`) dobijes **'ugli':1** i on bi trebao biti ukljucen vodeci se tekstom zadatka. 

Meni se cini da su nesto krivo na Edgaru postavili kao tocno rjesenje tj. vjv su koristili  to_tsquery(‚Äòenglish‚Äô, ‚Äòugli | worthi | famili‚Äô) iako to bas nije tocno s obzirom na tekst zadatka.

248807.content:
@"reygrep"#p248658 

Jel mo≈æe≈° postati  upit nakon rekurzije ?

Dobijem dobar broj za movies ako radim upit na tablicu nakon rekurzije

npr. ovo mi vraƒáa 318 itd. za sve ostale godine

```
SELECT genrename, EXTRACT (YEAR FROM viewstartdatetime) AS year, COUNT(*)
FROM films
WHERE genrename IN ('Movies')  AND  EXTRACT (YEAR FROM viewstartdatetime)=2019
GROUP BY genrename,year
```

no ako radim upit preko particija dobijem 300 za 2016 godinu

```
SELECT DISTINCT genrename, EXTRACT (YEAR FROM viewstartdatetime) AS year,

 COUNT (*) OVER(PARTITION BY genrename, EXTRACT (YEAR FROM viewstartdatetime) 
ORDER BY EXTRACT (YEAR FROM viewstartdatetime)),
COUNT (viewstartdatetime) OVER(PARTITION BY genrename ORDER BY EXTRACT (YEAR FROM viewstartdatetime) 
                                       RANGE BETWEEN 1 PRECEDING AND 1 FOLLOWING) 
FROM films
WHERE genrename ILIKE '%movie%'                                                         
GROUP BY genrename,viewstartdatetime
```

no ako radim upit za particije

248862.content:
@"mamaRu"#p248835 

To radi ako nema druge particije i promijenim GROUP BY u  genrename,year

```
SELECT DISTINCT genrename, EXTRACT (YEAR FROM viewstartdatetime) AS year,COUNT(*)
FROM films
WHERE genrename ILIKE '%movie%'                                                         
GROUP BY genrename,year
```
Ako dodam drugu particiju

```
COUNT (viewstartdatetime) OVER(PARTITION BY genrename 
ORDER BY EXTRACT (YEAR FROM viewstartdatetime) 
RANGE BETWEEN 1 PRECEDING AND 1 FOLLOWING)
```
da bi to radilo moram promijeniti GROUP BY u genrename, viewstartdatetime   (inaƒçe mi javi error da viewstartdatetime mora biti u GROUP BY). Tada mi naravno ne radi onaj prvi count jer grupiranje vi≈°e nije po godinama nego po timestampu.

Kako dodati drugu particiju u

```
SELECT DISTINCT genrename, EXTRACT (YEAR FROM viewstartdatetime) AS year,COUNT(*)
FROM films
WHERE genrename ILIKE '%movie%'                                                         
GROUP BY genrename,year

```

249049.content:
@"Zulul"#p249017 ja sam dodo ovo u select:
```sql
 CASE
        WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM viewstartdatetime) IN (1,2,3) THEN 1
        WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM viewstartdatetime) IN (4,5,6) THEN 2
        WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM viewstartdatetime) IN (7,8,9) THEN 3
        WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM viewstartdatetime) IN (10,11,12) THEN 4
    END as rbrKvartal
```
i onda u group by stavio rbrKvartal

249073.content:
@"TheManFromEarth"#p249068 E to ni ja ne znam

Trenutno sam na ovome i izbacuje 136 redaka

```sql
SELECT tracktitle, viewstartdatetime::date AS viewstartdate, 
SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER 
(PARTITION BY tracktitle
 ORDER BY viewstartdatetime::date 
 RANGE BETWEEN CURRENT ROW AND '6 months'::INTERVAL FOLLOWING) AS currentAndNext6Mon
FROM track
	NATURAL JOIN trackview
    NATURAL JOIN movie
    CROSS JOIN lateral regexp_split_to_table(track.tracktitle, '\y') r(word)
WHERE levenshtein(LOWER(word), 'tings') <= 2
GROUP BY tracktitle, viewstartdatetime, ownerid
```

249140.content:
@"Mc2"#p249006 

Ne ku≈æim u ƒçemu je problem, prije ove njihove promjene sve mi je radilo.

Probao sam i ovu variajantu ali ne prolazi

```
SELECT  * FROM crosstab (
			'SELECT duration::TIME,
					genrename,
					COUNT (DISTINCT profilename)
					FROM track NATURAL JOIN movie NATURAL JOIN trackgenre NATURAL JOIN genre 
                                        NATURAL JOIN profiletrack  NATURAL JOIN trackview NATURAL JOIN profile
					WHERE genrename IN (''Dramas'', ''Comedies'', ''Documentaries'',''Action & Adventure'') 
					AND to_TSVector(''english'', tracktitle || description) @@  ''activ | worthi | ride''
					GROUP BY duration,genrename
                                        ORDER BY duration,genrename',

					'SELECT UNNEST(ARRAY[''Action & Adventure'',''Comedies'',''Documentaries'',''Dramas'']) ')
					
                     AS PIVOTABLE (duration TIME, Action_Adventure VARCHAR, Comedies VARCHAR,  Documentaries VARCHAR, Dramas VARCHAR)

```

249241.content:
@"AntonioB25"#p249117 Zahvaljujem uspjelo i meni

Evo rje≈°enja za ovaj zadatak:

![](assets/2021-11-02/00048.png)
```

select tagerestriction, english, german, indonesian, korean
	from crosstab(
        '
         select tagerestriction, langname, count(distinct profilename)
        	from trackview
        	natural join track
			INNER join audiolang on audiolang.trackid = track.trackid
            INNER JOIN language ON audiolang.audiolangid = language.langid
        	INNER JOIN movie ON track.trackid = movie.trackid
        
        where 
        (to_tsvector(''english'',tracktitle) @@ to_tsquery(''english'',''activ | ride'')
		OR to_tsvector(''english'',description) @@ to_tsquery(''english'',''activ | ride''))
        and langname in (''English'', ''German'', ''Indonesian'', ''Korean'')
        group by tagerestriction, langname
        order by tagerestriction',
        'select unnest(array[''English'', ''German'', ''Indonesian'', ''Korean''])'
    ) as pivotTable(tagerestriction INT,  english INT, german INT, indonesian INT, korean INT)
    order by tagerestriction;
```

249246.content:
```postgresql
select * from crosstab
(
'with recursive genres(genre_id, genre_name, supgenre_id) as 
(
select genreid, genrename, genreid
    from genre
    union
    select genre_id, genre_name, genreid
    from genres, genre
    where supgenre_id = supgenreid
)
select distinct genre_name, extract(year from viewstartdatetime), count(viewstartdatetime)
from movie
    natural join trackgenre
    natural join trackview
    inner join genres ON genre_id = genreid
    where extract(year from viewstartdatetime) in (2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021)
	group by genre_name, extract(year from viewstartdatetime)
	order by genre_name',
'select unnest(array[2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021]) order by 1'
)
as pivottable(genrename varchar, y2016 int, y2017 int, y2018 int, y2019 int, y2020 int, y2021 int)
order by genrename
```

249252.content:
@"Patak007"#p249236 1.slika 

```sql
WITH RECURSIVE genres(genre1, genre2)
AS(
SELECT genreid, supgenreid
FROM genre
UNION 
SELECT genres.genre1
, genre.supgenreid as genre2
FROM genres, genre
WHERE genres.genre2 = genre.genreid 
)

select genrename, extract(month from viewstartdatetime) as month, count(*) as cntInMon,
sum(count(*)) over (partition by genre.genreid order by extract(month from viewstartdatetime) range between 2 preceding and 2 following) cntIn2PrevCurrAnd2FollowMon
from genre left join genres on genre.genreid = genres.genre2 
join trackgenre on (trackgenre.genreid = genres.genre1 or trackgenre.genreid = genre.genreid)
join trackview on trackview.trackid = trackgenre.trackid
join movie on movie.trackid = trackview.trackid
where lower(genrename) like '%anime%'
group by genre.genreid, genrename, month
order by genre.genreid asc, month asc
```

```sql
select * from crosstab
(
   'with recursive genres(gid, supgid, gname) as (
	select genreid, supgenreid, genrename
	from genre
	union 
	select genres.gid, genre.supgenreid as supgid, genrename
	from genres, genre
	where genres.supgid = genre.genreid 
	)

	select genrename, extract(year from viewstartdatetime), count(viewstartdatetime)
	from genre 
    left join genres on genre.genreid = genres.supgid
	join trackgenre on (trackgenre.genreid = genres.gid or trackgenre.genreid = genre.genreid)
	join trackview on trackview.trackid = trackgenre.trackid
	join movie on movie.trackid = trackview.trackid
    where extract(year from viewstartdatetime) in (2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021)
	group by genrename, extract(year from viewstartdatetime)
 	order by genrename',

   'select unnest(array[2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021]) order by 1'
)
as pivottable(genrename varchar(50), y2016 int, y2017 int, y2018 int, y2019 int, y2020 int, y2021 int)
order by genrename
```

249335.content:
@"prx_xD"#p249307 

```sql
select * from crosstab
(
   'with recursive genres(gid, supgid, gname) as (
	select genreid, genreid, genrename
	from genre
	union 
	select genres.gid, genre.genreid, gname
	from genres, genre
	where supgid = supgenreid 
	)

	select gname, extract(year from viewstartdatetime), count(viewstartdatetime)
	from genres left
	join trackgenre on (trackgenre.genreid = genres.supgid)
	join trackview on trackview.trackid = trackgenre.trackid
	join movie on movie.trackid = trackview.trackid
    where extract(year from viewstartdatetime) in (2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021)
	group by gname, genres.gid, extract(year from viewstartdatetime)
 	order by genres.gid',

   'select unnest(array[2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021]) order by 1'
)
as pivottable(genrename varchar(50), y2016 int, y2017 int, y2018 int, y2019 int, y2020 int, y2021 int)
```

249410.content:
@"NightRaid92"#p249306 

Ako ima netko da se jo≈° muƒçi s ovim numOfLikes, evo rje≈°enja:

```
WITH RECURSIVE genres(genid, supgenid, genname) AS (
	SELECT genreid, genreid, genrename
	FROM genre
	UNION
	SELECT genres.genid, genre.genreid, genname
	FROM genres, genre
	WHERE supgenid = supgenreid
) SELECT genid, genname, COUNT(*) AS numoflikes
FROM genres LEFT JOIN trackgenre ON genres.supgenid = trackgenre.genreid
NATURAL JOIN track NATURAL JOIN movie NATURAL JOIN profiletrack
WHERE liked = 1
GROUP BY genid, genname
ORDER BY genname
```
